contents:
不是只商討而已。Youtube 有大舉黃標和疫情有關的視頻不給加廣告。
Google 搜 coronavirus 這個詞在搜索結果上方有强制置頂的 Help and information:
Coronavirus advisory information | World Health Organization | Website who.int/emergencies
Coronavirus condition overview | World Health Organization | Website who.int/health-topics
Coronavirus Q&A | World Health Organization | Website who.int/news-room
以WHO爲準的輿論引導效果是很明顯的。
